"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fabbff6368721949350000#post_53fabbff6368721949350000
That's just the intro of "hey fans let's wank your fan boner of getting a anime by showing off all the characters you love"; after they go to the flashback the story actually starts happening.  You can completely disregard the intro.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fabbeb6368725fdc9e0100#post_53fabbeb6368725fdc9e0100
Silent sinner in blue if you want a long story arc; wild and horned hermit if you want less long story arcs; forbidden scrollery if you want extreme metric fuck tons of japanese mythology; inaba of the earth and inaba of the moon if you want comedy; strange and natural bright diety if you want slice of life.

Silent sinner in blue, wild and horned hermit and forbidden scrollery are the strongest story wise.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fac0836368721f4bfb0000#post_53fac0836368721f4bfb0000
Nah; the reason reason why it has a all female case when you get right down to it is that is that Zun(creator of Touhou) wants a franchise where the heroes and such are female.  If anything having a all female cast is a good thing because it's not pandering to otaku; rather it's giving us heroes and characters that are positive role models for women.


Reimu(the shrine maiden) even though her job is to exterminate Youkai such as the vampires and such and even though she's a foul mouth hot head she is still a good person that refuses to kill anyone no matter who they are and is quick to forgive people for their wrong doings befriending them in the process.  Even though she claims she hates vampires, fairies and such hanging out at her shrine and "being a nuisance" during one of the manga she admits that it's not so bad being friends with them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

Man, it be so cool if those two meet up in real life.
